games.name: Forgotten pharaoh
games.description: Prepare yourself for an adventure into the mystical tombs of Ancient Egypt with OneTouch’s intriguing new game release, Forgotten Pharaoh. Only the very bravest of players will dare to join this action-packed adventure through time, where age-old treasure could be discovered along the way. With stunningly realistic graphics, Ancient Egyptian-inspired symbols and thrilling gameplay features, all accompanied by a pitch-perfect soundtrack of the same theme, it’s a journey you won’t forget in a hurry.

games.name: Baccarat
games.description: This classic table game delivers stunning gameplay and cutting-edge design, providing an unrivalled baccarat experience across desktop, tablet and mobile with the most intuitive user experience to date. For seasoned players, the game includes our signature “squeeze” feature, where players can gradually roll any edge of the card to reveal, heightening the suspense and thrill of the game. Our mobile-first Baccarat also offers a range of side-bet options for players to enjoy and features the two most popular roadmaps: Bead Road and Big Road.

games.name: Lucky lion
games.description: Lucky Lion takes players on an epic adventure through the Far East in pursuit of riches beyond your wildest imagination. The game sees a wide range of colourful, Asian-themed symbols, including the magnificent Lucky Lion, inviting players into an exciting new world. Set against the engrossing backdrop of a mysterious far-Eastern temple, the title offers a thrilling entertainment experience and the chance to win massive prizes.

games.name: Neon 2077
games.description: Immerse yourself into the futuristic world of Neon 2077. This cyberpunk-themed slot transports players to a high tech world full of drones, laser guns and electronic data-filled cases. Featuring bright neon lights and backgrounds which change depending on the player’s time of day, the slot should only be played by the adventurous type. Those tasked with transportation can expect special sideways scrolling reels featuring a replicator to multiply wins.

games.name: Loot or boot
games.description: Buccaneering bettors are invited all aboard our latest engrossing title, Loot or Boot. A fast-paced arcade game showcasing world class visual effects, an inviting pirate theme and highly immersive sounds, players slow to hoist the main sale may be forced to walk the plank! Gamers enjoying the arcade game are likely to encounter thematic symbols including a treasure chest, bottles stuffed with treasure maps and skull-engraved gold coins as they gallantly sail the high seas on a creaky piratical vessel. The fascinating arcade game takes seafaring players on an oceanic voyage to discover buried treasure alongside a hearty crew of mischievous pirates. Easy symbols appear as bottles stuffed with treasure maps, featuring in three out of every four wins. Medium symbols appear as keys, featuring in two out of every four wins Hard symbols appear as skull-engraved gold coins, featuring in two out of every four wins.

games.name: Sic bo
games.description: Developed in consultation with Asia-based game and design experts, Sic Bo is built to appeal to players across a wide range of markets. The game boasts unique portrait-first mobile gameplay while still retaining its authentic features, such as the gold dome and dice roll action. A premium on-the-go betting experience for the new-age mobile casino game player.

games.name: Bubbles bonanza
games.description: Dive into an underwater world in search of hidden treasure with the release of Bubbles Bonanza. With an immersive soundtrack and aptly-themed deep-sea symbols including octopus, seahorses and lobsters, players are tasked with matching as many as they can. Social-gaming inspired, the more symbols players match the bigger the chance of winning bigger prizes, with multiple of x10, x20, x100 and x200 available.

games.name: Blackjack classic
games.description: No online casino offering is complete without Blackjack and our classic mobile-first version will leave players feeling as though they are at the table. Combining technology with traditional table games and retaining that authenticity is OneTouch’s speciality and this is no different, with touch screen buttons designed to be truly mobile. Featuring Blackjack’s standard bets and payouts, players can now experience the world’s most famous card game on the go and in the palm of their hand where the casino can come to them.

games.name: Steam vault
games.description: Step back in time to enjoy a future classic with Steam Vault. It’s sure to appeal to fans of steampunk, a style that combines historical elements with bygone technological features inspired by science fiction. Featuring classic stepper reels with highly engaging features and bonus rounds, Steam Vault offers a perfect blend between a bygone era and the exciting future. Collect symbols as you spin the reels and you may just find yourself in the Bonus Vault, a secret underground treasure trove where players spin once for the chance to win huge sums.

games.name: Russian poker
games.description: A fun twist on five card draw, Russian Poker is a game hugely popular with Central and Eastern European markets and is sure to appeal to a wide range of others. Each hand is packed with potential action where players can make up to two hand combinations from 6 cards and maximise their wins against the dealer. As with all our releases, it has been designed for truly mobile-first game play. Meaning the layout is created so players can play with the use of just one hand.

games.name: Roulette
games.description: No online casino is complete without Roulette, but none master the mobile-first editions of the classic table game quite like this. Designed to accommodate all players, our roulette features all of the authentic elements you would expect from the real casino game, with a modern touch. Featuring high end graphics and immersive sound effects, this edition is designed to be played in the palm of your hand, with a carefully crafted UI giving it a truly on-the-go feel.

games.name: Wheel of fortune
games.description: Try your luck at the exhilarating casino classic, Wheel of Fortune. This absorbing title is tailor-made for anyone looking to experience the time-honoured ‘spin to win’ thrill of a roulette wheel. Also known as the “Big Wheel”, this iconic game is so popular that it is often positioned next to the entrance of land-based casinos, allowing excited gamblers to get in on the action as soon as they arrive. Featuring stunning and brightly coloured visual effects alongside an original casino soundtrack, players are encouraged to keep fingers crossed while the wheel spins to determine a lucky winner.

games.name: Andar Bahar
games.description: Join us on a luxurious adventure to the Indian sub-continent and try your hand in one of the country’s most popular card games, Andar Bahar. A tradition with routes in southern India dating back hundreds of years, this immersive title allows you to enjoy Andar Bahar in a regal setting fit for a Maharaja, where royal prizes await at every turn in this wonderfully simple game. Players are invited to pull up a virtual chair and partake in the fun! Players choose whether the initial middle card will be matched on the left side (Andar) or right side (Bahar). During the first-round players may place a side bet on the middle card’s suit and its rank below or above eight.

games.name: God hand
games.description: Press the spin button and watch as a God-like figure drops a boulder below. If he deals you a lucky hand with a coloured ball you could claim a big prize, while if a golden ball appears you will be immediately transported to the Gold Rush free spin round where a Goddess serves you with the chance of a win of biblical proportions. But even if you don’t manage to hit those heights, a clever Last Judge ball is designed to give players one more chance to come away with a heavenly feeling.

games.name: Juicy 7
games.description: Take a trip back in time with our bona fide retro slot game, Juicy 7. The title’s old fashioned fruit machine theme harks back to mechanical machines of days gone by, with a host of classic symbols delivering a timeless hit for the modern age Immersively fruity visual effects combine with a nostalgic casino soundtrack to give players a premium entertainment experience, and every spin provides a thrilling chance to win big.

games.name: Ganbaruto battle
games.description: Jump into the Sumo ring with wrestling icon Baruto Kaito in our intriguing new slot game, Ganbaruto Battle. Featuring a groundbreaking range of symbols and characters, including the legendary Baruto Kaito himself, all lovers of Japanese culture are welcomed into the realm of Sumo’s leading superstar. Showcasing a Japanese-inspired visual theme, an alluring Wheel Bonus and the Sumo legend himself, it’s an experience not to be missed! The 5×3 release’s thematic symbols include Kaito himself, awarding six Free Spins when three or more appear on the grid. Players could also unlock the Wheel Bonus, where prizes are segmented according to value, encouraging win-hungry gamblers to reach the next level of the game.

games.name: Dragon tiger
games.description: Unleash your ferocity with the popular Asian card game, Dragon Tiger. Depicting the battle between the dragon (dealer) and the tiger (player), this table game offers the latest in high-end graphics and immersive sounds. Featuring a wealth of betting options and side bets, Dragon Tiger challenges players to choose which animal is victorious. With an authentic soundtrack playing in the background, only the roar of the tiger on a winning player hand disrupts the casino ambience with players able to win up to 10x their stake.

games.name: Golden stripe
games.description: Unleash your wild side with Golden Stripe. Set in the Far East, Golden Stripe takes slot action back to its purest form, with a 1×3 stepper style adding a sense of uncomplicated elegance. Featuring fierce tigers, a menagerie of other symbols and a pulse-raising soundtrack, you’ll feel as though you have immersed yourself into the wild. Hit the special symbols and players will find themselves climbing up seven pay tables whose rewards are visible around the temple in which the game is set.

games.name: Fortune miner
games.description: Prepared to get your hands dirty as and dig for treasures in Fortune Miner. Tunnel your way underground in search of gems, dynamite wilds, bonus rounds and where riches can be one swing of the pickaxe away. Simple, fast-paced and designed to be played anywhere, Fortune Miner features a randomly triggered re-spin, which kicks by removing all royals and collapsing the remaining symbols to fill any empty spots to increase your chances of winning.

games.name: Traveling treasures india
games.description: Pack your bags and prepare for the adventure of a lifetime with Travelling Treasures India. This perfectly illustrated Indian-themed slot allows you to see the sights of the country while hunting for precious gems including lucrative emeralds. With the Taj Mahal and other sites to view, this vibrant and colourful offering will leave you feeling truly immersed in the culture.

games.name: Traveling treasures brazil
games.description: Come and join our samba-studded extravaganza in the vibrant slot game, Traveling Treasures Brazil. This thrilling title showcases a colorful Brazilian theme, with carnival-inspired symbols, recognisable national icons and ostentatious outfits to match. Fun loving players can enjoy the cascading wins, with all winning symbols replaced on the reels to keep the party going. With an excitement-building mechanic that grows the multiplier with every successive win, this tropical title is sure to keep you entertained all night long.

games.name: Tiki terror
games.description: Do you dare to brave the ghostly world of Tiki Terror in search of mystery wins? Packed with spooky Tiki symbols and bloodcurdling sounds, winning combinations set terrifying Tiki masks alight in this action-packed game. This otherworldly title challenges you to match symbols, with stacks of scatters and free spins available for those who successfully brave its enchanted gameplay.

games.name: MVP Hoops
games.description: Step onto the court and take your best shot at our thrilling basketball-themed slot game, MVP Hoops. The title boasts cascading reels where winning symbols are replaced on the grid by new ones, with players leaving it all out on the court to enjoy the innovative And One feature when three Bonus round symbols appear on a payline. After each win payline symbols are replaced with fresh cascading symbols and the reels are re-evaluated for new wins. Free Games are triggered when 3 or more symbols land on an active payline. During Free Games, subsequent free spins can be triggered by scattered symbols, up to a maximum of 300.

games.name: Beats EX
games.description: Our new slot game, BeatsEx, invites partying players to put on their dancing shoes and get lost in the rhythm of the night! Fun-loving punters can get into the Groove with pumping DJ-themed symbols and table-turning soundtrack to make for an unforgettable audiovisual experience. Dance your way to the winners party with the Beats EX Feature Game. The probability of retriggering rises the more the feature continues, so boogying bettors can keep the party going all night long. Line up 3 or more Trigger Symbols in a row to trigger the BeatsEx Feature Game. The trigger symbols not only increase in number the more the feature is continuously retriggered, they are also upgraded to higher payout symbols for even bigger payouts. The probability to retrigger raises to a maximum 93% when the symbol is upgraded to “Beats 7”, this could be you!

games.name: Grand heist
games.description: Prepare yourself for a high-risk, high-reward mission with OneTouch’s latest game, Grand Heist. In this thrilling new slot, the nerves of players will be put to the test as they try to successfully complete a daring raid, in order to reap big rewards. With realistic and gritty graphics, players will be transported to the exhilarating world of criminal activity, making it an experience they won’t forget. Grand Heist is an exciting 8×8 slot that takes players on a thrilling, high risk-reward journey in a bid to win big. With free bets galore, the game equips players with the best tools to walk away with the well-guarded gold in Grand Heist.
